description: Defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to Invoice operations, including request and response structures, for use in the web layer of the invoice backend system.

classes.name: InvoiceDtos
classes.description: Container class for various invoice-related Data Transfer Objects (DTOs).

classes.name: InvoiceItemRequest
classes.description: Represents the data required to create or update an invoice item.

classes.name: InvoiceCreateRequest
classes.description: Represents the data needed to create a new invoice.

classes.name: InvoiceUpdateRequest
classes.description: Represents the data for updating an existing invoice.

classes.name: InvoiceResponse
classes.description: Contains invoice details returned to clients.

methods.name: InvoiceItemRequest
methods.description: Constructor or initializer for invoice item request objects.

methods.name: InvoiceCreateRequest
methods.description: Constructor or initializer for new invoice creation request objects.

methods.name: InvoiceUpdateRequest
methods.description: Constructor or initializer for updating invoice objects.

methods.name: InvoiceResponse
methods.description: Constructor or initializer for invoice response objects.
